name: Santa Catarina Shandy

ingredients.item: Honey syrup (2 parts honey, 1 part water)

preparation:
Add the cachaça, lemon juice and honey syrup to a shaker and fill with ice.
Shake, and strain into a Collins glass.
Add 5 or 6 ice cubes to the glass and top with beer, pouring gently so it doesn't foam over.
Stir briefly and garnish with a few grinds of pink peppercorn.
